item.title: How To Make ::pure and other commands?
item.dc:creator: @Treber Treber
item.description:
@Treber wrote:

It would all be the same just renaming the skills. So lets say you want to remove runecrafting and add hunting. You really just rename everything that was “Runecrafting” to “Hunter”.

Really simple but actually created the skills is much too difficult lol.

item.source: How To Make ::pure and other commands?

item.title: How To Make ::pure and other commands?
item.dc:creator: @Treber Treber
item.description:
@Treber wrote:

Well, real simple. Copy and paste this code under the rest of your codes in client.java, I recommend just searching for master or what not as most servers have that.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0);

Above is the basic pure command.

"14000000" is the amount of EXP the player will receive once executing the command.

"0" is the level in which he will receive the EXP.

0 is attack, 1 is strength, 2 is defense, and so on.

Obviously you can see "Player Rights >= 0"

0, Regular, 1 Moderator, 2, Administrator, 3, Ownership, 4 Hidden.

Just change that to what ever you please.

Read full topic
